alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 5:09AM MST until February 16 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Gila National Forest and surrounding lowlands including Sierra, Grant, Luna, southern Hidalgo, and northern Dona Ana Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reductions in visibility due to blowing dust are possible. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
